Class SnakeHead

java.lang.Object
  Item
      SnakeHead

public class SnakeHead
extends Item

The snake head is the player! It is an item that can move one step forward or to its left or right.

assign3
Author:
babak

SnakeHead(Desert d)
          Initialize the snake head by setting its location in the center of the desert, and its initial direction which is North.

Constructor Detail

SnakeHead

public SnakeHead(Desert d)
Initialize the snake head by setting its location in the center of the desert, and its initial direction which is North.

Method Detail

moveForward

public void moveForward()
Move one step forward

moveLeft

public void moveLeft()
Move one step to the left. This also changes the snake's direction.

moveRight

public void moveRight()
Move one step to the right. This also changes the snake's direction.

toString

public java.lang.String toString()
Overrides:
toString in class java.lang.Object
Returns:
a string representation of the snake's head. This string will reflect the snake head's current direction:
  • "^" for North
  • "v" for South
  • "<" for West
  • ">" for East
